channel.title: Commands
channel.description:
Ok well in my server in the spell book it says in minigames "Assault" Nomad" "Suggest on fourms" Im going to change the "Suggest on fourms" to a donorzone so how can I make it so when they click that it send them to the donorzone and how can I make it so only donators go there? I have where I want the donorzone to be and I have the cords I just need help with what I said above.
(I am using PI)
